casebody.data:
<casebody firstpage="1490" lastpage="1490" xmlns="http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:HLS.Libr.US_Case_Law.Schema.Case_Body:v1">
<parties id="p-1">
  In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Leroy Russell CASTLE.
 </parties>
<docketnumber id="p-2">
  No. D-2883.
 </docketnumber>
<court id="p-3">
  Supreme Court of the United States
 </court>
<decisiondate id="p-4">
  March 21, 2016.
 </decisiondate>
<opinion id="p-5">
  Leroy Russell Castle, of Durham, North Carolina, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
 </opinion>

</casebody>
